ai-tha-ap289:1.3_0: I bowed with my head at the feet,
ai-tha-ap289:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap289:3.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap289:4.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable these verses.
ai-tha-ap289:5.1_0: and the seventh of the senior monks.
